result.execSummary:
The defendant Kevin L Kaufman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Misappropriate ID Info - Avoid Penalty [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.201(2)(b).
  • Bail Jumping-Felony [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office. 

Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, 

DNA Sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

22CF613:

Ct. 2 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 2 Years Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Court finds 0 days credit.
